full_text: Fwd: Re: Quick question. From (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To BOP-IPP/PublicAffairs@bop.govLee Plourde Date 2019/08/13 11:09 Subject: Fwd: Re: Quick question. Attachments: TEXT.htm Copy. >>> BOP-IPP/Public Affairs 8/13/2019 8:24 AM >>> This came to our email intake box - just confirming that we are Not discussing anything with reporters. Please forward inquiries from national press so we are aware and can respond as normal (Central office handles National press inquiries). Thanks much! (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Office of Public Affairs Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 514-6551 - phone (202) 514-6620 - fax >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @cbsnews.com> 8/12/2019 10:52 PM >>> Lee, would you call me please? (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Senior Producer, Investigative Unit CBS News C: 917-714(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) On Aug 10, 2019, at 9:34 PM, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @(b)(6), (b)(7)(C).cbsnews.com> wrote: Thank you. Lee what is your cell number? (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Senior Producer, Investigative Unit CBS News C: 917-714(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) On Aug 10, 2019, at 6:08 PM, BOP-IPP/Public Affairs <BOP-IPP/PublicAffairs@bop.gov> wrote: External Email Page 7671 DOJ-OGR-00024287

text_blocks.content: From (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To BOP-IPP/PublicAffairs@bop.govLee Plourde Date 2019/08/13 11:09 Subject: Fwd: Re: Quick question. Attachments: TEXT.htm Copy.

>>> BOP-IPP/Public Affairs 8/13/2019 8:24 AM >>> This came to our email intake box - just confirming that we are Not discussing anything with reporters. Please forward inquiries from national press so we are aware and can respond as normal (Central office handles National press inquiries). Thanks much!
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Office of Public Affairs Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 514-6551 - phone (202) 514-6620 - fax
>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @cbsnews.com> 8/12/2019 10:52 PM >>> Lee, would you call me please?
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Senior Producer, Investigative Unit CBS News C: 917-714(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
On Aug 10, 2019, at 9:34 PM, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @(b)(6), (b)(7)(C).cbsnews.com> wrote: Thank you. Lee what is your cell number?
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Senior Producer, Investigative Unit CBS News C: 917-714(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
On Aug 10, 2019, at 6:08 PM, BOP-IPP/Public Affairs <BOP-IPP/PublicAffairs@bop.gov> wrote:

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions of personal information marked as (b)(6), (b)(7)(C). The email chain is between a CBS News producer and the Federal Bureau of Prisons Public Affairs office.
